Tyrande.name: Light of Elune
Tyrande.description: Heal an ally Hero for 270 (+4% per level). Light of Elune's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds every time Tyrande hits an enemy with a Basic Attack or damages an enemy Hero.  Stores up to 2 charges. Cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.

Tyrande.name: Sentinel
Tyrande.description: Send an Owl across the battleground revealing its path, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage to the first Hero hit, and revealing them for 5 seconds. If a Hero revealed by Sentinel dies, refresh its cooldown.

Tyrande.name: Lunar Flare
Tyrande.description: After 0.75 seconds, deal 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stun enemies in the target area for 0.75 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Shadowstalk
Tyrande.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

Tyrande.name: Starfall
Tyrande.description: Deal 92 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

Tyrande.name: Hunter's Mark
Tyrande.description: Reveal a non-Structure enemy and reduce their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.  Passive: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 1% of her maximum Health, doubled against targets with Hunter's Mark.

1.name: Ranger
1.description: Sentinel pierces the first Hero hit. Its width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

1.name: Lunar Blaze
1.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 150%.

1.name: Trueshot Aura
1.description: Activate to grant other nearby allied Heroes 40% increased Attack Damage for 5 seconds, and to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark.  Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 30%.

4.name: Everlasting Light
4.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 80% more.

4.name: Mark of Mending
4.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks against Marked targets heal other allied Heroes near the enemy for 4% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Elune's Chosen
4.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 175% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

7.name: Moonlit Arrows
7.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Kaldorei Resistance
7.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

7.name: Huntress' Fury
7.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 92 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows enemies hit by 35% and reduces their damage dealt by 35% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ranger's Mark
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 2 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by 4 seconds.

16.name: Celestial Attunement
16.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

16.name: Empower
16.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. Heroes hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 6% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Darnassian Archery
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 12% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 10 seconds and heals for 75% more.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Increase the Slow of Starfall to 60% and cause it to apply Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
